ComicInfo.Summary:
It’s zombie witches vs monster truckers as Zombie Tramp’s road saga comes to a furious conclusion! Also, Vampblade’s along for the ride!!!
Features 3 regular and risqué variants, including a pair of variants by series creator Dan Mendoza (DollFace)!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Regular Cover | Celor | 1 | B | Risqué Cover, Limited to 2500 | Celor | 4 | C | Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Dan Mendoza | 5 | D | Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Dan Mendoza | 6 | E | Artist Variant Cover, Limited to 2000 | Winston Young | 7 | F | Artist Risqué Variant Cover, Limited to 2500 | Winston Young | 8 | G | Emerald City Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover | Bill McKay | 2 | H | Emerald City Comic Con Exclusive Risqué Variant Cover | Bill McKay | 3 |
